org.csstudio.ams.connector.sms.internal
Class SampleService

java.lang.Object
  org.csstudio.ams.connector.sms.internal.SampleService

public class SampleService
extends java.lang.Object

This example service demonstrates that the preference IDs that are used on preference pages should be defined by the services that use them.

Beside the definition of the preference IDs, this services provides the method showPreferences that reads out the preference values from the plugin's preference store and displays them. This demonstrates how the preferences are accessed.

Author:
Alexander Will
